message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to us both. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you today. My proposal is to sell this product to you for $1,150,000. I believe this price reflects its true worth while allowing us to reach a fair agreement. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction.
